feed.title: Password Pusher Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Password Pusher: v1.50.3: Theme Bug Fix & Latest Language Strings
entry.content:
:memo: What’s Changed

  • Cyborg Theme: Upstream Bootswatch Fix (#2942) @pglombardo

:rocket: Features

  • Latest Translation Strings (#2943) @pglombardo

:arrow_up: Dependencies updates

  • :arrow_up: Bump importmap-rails from 2.0.3 to 2.1.0 (#2926) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump net-imap from 0.5.2 to 0.5.4 (#2924) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump helm/kind-action from 1.11.0 to 1.12.0 (#2929) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump pry from 0.15.0 to 0.15.2 (#2931) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump rubocop-rails from 2.27.0 to 2.28.0 (#2936) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump tilt from 2.4.0 to 2.5.0 (#2923) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump solid_queue from 1.1.0 to 1.1.1 (#2939) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-partitions from 1.1025.0 to 1.1029.0 (#2940) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump bigdecimal from 3.1.8 to 3.1.9 (#2937) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump sqlite3 from 2.4.1 to 2.5.0 (#2938) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump jwt from 2.9.3 to 2.10.1 (#2941) @dependabot

:busts_in_silhouette: List of contributors

@dependabot, @dependabot[bot] and @pglombardo

:motor_boat: Docker Images

Available on Docker Hub: https://hub.docker.com/r/pglombardo/pwpush

:running_man: Run This Version

bash docker run -d -p 5100:5100 pglombardo/pwpush:1.50.3

..and go to http://localhost:5100

entry.title: New release for Password Pusher: v1.50.6: Fix Preliminary Double Loading
entry.content:
This releases fixes an issue where under some circumstances, the "Click Here to Proceed" link was being pre-loaded via Javascript optimization and burning up a view.

:memo: What’s Changed

  • Fix: Block preliminary pre-loading (#2993) @pglombardo
  • Tools: New Docker release tagging script (#2989) @pglombardo

:arrow_up: Dependencies updates

  • :arrow_up: Bump ruby from 3.3-alpine to 3.4-alpine in /containers/docker (#2944) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump parser from 3.3.6.0 to 3.3.7.0 (#2992) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-partitions from 1.1038.0 to 1.1039.0 (#2991) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump rdoc from 6.10.0 to 6.11.0 (#2990) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump rubocop-performance from 1.23.0 to 1.23.1 (#2957) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-sdk-s3 from 1.177.0 to 1.178.0 (#2987) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-sdk-core from 3.215.1 to 3.216.0 (#2986) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump google-apis-core from 0.15.1 to 0.16.0 (#2985) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump concurrent-ruby from 1.3.4 to 1.3.5 (#2984) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-sdk-kms from 1.96.0 to 1.97.0 (#2983) @dependabot

:busts_in_silhouette: List of contributors

@dependabot, @dependabot[bot] and @pglombardo

entry.title: New release for Password Pusher: v1.50.7: Fix Broken Docker Container; Dependency & Security Updates
entry.content:
:memo: What’s Changed

As reported in #3037, the Docker container was failing to boot. This release should resolve that issue. Thanks for reporting all!

:rocket: Features

  • Fix Broken Container and Other Dockerfile Improvements (#2981) @pglombardo

:arrow_up: Dependencies updates

  • :arrow_up: Bump unicode-display_width from 2.6.0 to 3.1.4 (#3020) @dependabot[bot]
  • :arrow_up: Bump terminal-table from 3.0.2 to 4.0.0 (#3019) @dependabot[bot]
  • :arrow_up: Bump language_server-protocol from 3.17.0.3 to 3.17.0.4 (#3022) @dependabot[bot]
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-sdk-s3 from 1.178.0 to 1.179.0 (#3030) @dependabot[bot]
  • :arrow_up: Bump overcommit from 0.65.0 to 0.66.0 (#3031) @dependabot[bot]
  • :arrow_up: Bump rack from 3.1.8 to 3.1.9 (#3035) @dependabot[bot]
